remarks:
Specialization rule for restricted quantification, with three quantifiers.  (Contributed by NM, 20-Nov-1994.) 

---

 Specialization rule for restricted quantification.  (Contributed by NM, 20-Nov-1994.)
statement:
rspec3.1 $e |- A. x e. A A. y e. B A. z e. C ph $.
rspec3 $p |- ( ( x e. A /\ y e. B /\ z e. C ) -> ph ) $.
